Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the number of Muslims praying in large numbers at Patparganj, New Delhi, as the video only shows a group of Muslims praying, and it is unclear how many people are actually present.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating in the claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times.

Exist alternative explanation: There is no evidence of alternative explanations being considered in the claim.
